title: What happens when you become a fugitive of justice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you mean a “fugitive from justice?” Well then, until justice catches up from you, you spend your time fighting (or at least hiding from) the law until the law wins. You’ll hide in lonely desperation! You’ll be forced to change your identity! You’ll toil at many jobs! You’ll search for a one-armed man you saw leave the scene of the crime! You’ll run before the relentless pursuit of the police lieutenant obsessed with your capture! (Except in the movie, in which you’ll run from the relentless pursuit of the deputy US marshal obsessed with your capture.) And, afterwards you’ll work as a US Treasury agent and open up a private eye agency in San Diego.
